VARDESC: Do you currently wear a mask at work?
column18: Yes, during contact with patients with known or suspected COVID-19

COMMENT1: ASK IF 'Do you currently wear a mask at work?'='N95 respirator' OR 'Do you currently wear a mask at work?'='Surgical mask'
column20: Surgical mask for low risk followed by N95/PAPR for known or suspected COVID19

VARDESC: During the last day you were at work, how much of a problem did you have getting appropriate access to the following types of PPE? Respiratory mask (e.g., N95, KN95, or other)
During the last day you were at work, how much of a problem did you have getting appropriate access to the following types of PPE? Surgical mask
During the last day you were at work, how much of a problem did you have getting appropriate access to the following types of PPE? Powered air purifying respirator (PAPR)
During the last day you were at work, how much of a problem did you have getting appropriate access to the following types of PPE? Face shield/goggles
During the last day you were at work, how much of a problem did you have getting appropriate access to the following types of PPE? Gloves
During the last day you were at work, how much of a problem did you have getting appropriate access to the following types of PPE? Gowns
During the last day you were at work, how much of a problem did you have getting appropriate access to the following types of PPE? Hand sanitizer
During the last day you were at work, how much of a problem did you have getting appropriate access to the following types of PPE? Soap
During the last day you were at work, how much of a problem did you have getting appropriate access to the following types of PPE? Cleaning/disinfecting products
During the last day you were at work, for how many patients did you have to re-use the same N95/KN95 mask respirator or surgical mask when you would have otherwise used a new mask?
